power.title: Advancing Poise
power.fluff: Your words allow your friends to drive back your enemies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another Warlord at-will attack, you gain the following benefits:

section.name: Opportune Command:
section.text: If the target ally hits with a melee attack, her or she can push the target enemy 1 square. If the attack already pushes, increase the push by 1 square instead.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: When you hit an enemy with a melee attack, until the end of your next turn, allies in your warlord's aura have a +1 bonus to attack rolls against that enemy with attacks that push, pull, or slide.

power.title: Brash Poise
power.fluff: Your bold tactics leave you open to an enemy's counterattack, but that's just what you want

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another Warlord at-will attack, you gain the following benefits:

section.name: Opportune Command:
section.text: If the target enemy has made an attack against you since the end of your previous turn, the target ally gains combat advantage for the attack.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: If an enemy critically hits you and deals damage, all allies in the aura have combat advantage on their first attack against that enemy before the start of the enemy's next turn.

power.title: Bull's-Eye Poise
power.fluff: By making a ranged attack against a target, you guide your allies' ranged attack to strike true

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another Warlord at-will attack, you gain the following benefits:

section.name: Opportune Command:
section.text: The target ally gains a bonus to the damage roll if he or she makes a ranged attack. The bonus equals your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 2 + your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 4 + your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: When you hit an enemy with a ranged attack, until the end of your next turn, your allies in your warlord's aura gain a +1 bonus to ranged attack rolls against that target.

power.title: Doubleteam Poise
power.fluff: Under your guidance your allies combine their efforts

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another Warlord at-will attack, you gain the following benefits:

section.name: Opportune Command:
section.text: The target ally can shift up to 2 squares as either the first effect of the attack or the last effect of the attack he or she makes. He or she must end the shift adjacent to either you or an ally.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: When you miss all targets of an attack, you can choose an ally in your warlord's aura. The first attack that the chosen ally makes against any target of the missing attack gains a +2 power bonus to the attack roll. This attack must come before the end of the chosen ally's next turn.
Also, you and allies in the aura gain a +1 bonus to AC and Will while adjacent to an ally.

power.title: Furious Poise
power.fluff: Your ferocious attack inspires your allies to match your fervor

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another Warlord at-will attack, you gain the following benefits:

section.name: Opportune Command:
section.text: If you are bloodied, the target ally's attack deals additional damage equal to your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 2 + your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 4 + your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.
If the target ally is bloodied, he or she gains a +2 bonus to the attack roll.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: When you hit an enemy with an attack, all allies in your warlord's aura have a bonus to the first melee damage roll they make against that enemy before the end of your next turn. The bonus equals one-half your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier (minimum +1 bonus).

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2 + your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

power.title: Mobility Poise
power.fluff: Your encouragement allows your allies to move that one step further towards triumph

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another Warlord at-will attack, you gain the following benefits:

section.name: Opportune Command:
section.text: The target ally can move his or her speed as the first effect of the attack. If the ally did not move the full distance, he or she can move the remaining distance as the last effect of the attack.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: When an ally in your warlord's aura uses a power that allows him or her to move or shift, including charging, the distance increases by 1 square. This also applies when one of your powers allows an ally to move or shift.
If you hit with an attack during your turn, this increases to 2 squares until the start of your next turn.

power.title: Overwhelming Tide Poise
power.fluff: You direct your allies to attack your enemies relentlessly, like an incoming tide

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another Warlord at-will attack, you gain the following benefits:

section.name: Opportune Command:
section.text: If the target ally's attack hits, until the end of your next turn, allies in your warlord's aura have a bonus to attack rolls with charge attacks against the target enemy. The bonus equals +2 if the ally made a melee attack, or +1 if he or she made a ranged attack. The bonus applies if the ally starts or ends the charge attack in the aura.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: When you hit an enemy with an attack on your turn, until the end of your next turn, allies in your warlord's aura have a bonus to damage rolls when they charge that enemy. The bonus equals your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier. The bonus applies if the ally starts or ends the charge attack in the aura.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 2 + your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 4 + your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

power.title: Rousing Poise
power.fluff: Your presence inspires confidence in your allies, allowing them to persevere longer

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another Warlord at-will attack, you gain the following benefits:

section.name: Opportune Command:
section.text: If the target ally's attack hits, he or she gains temporary hit points equal to your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 3 + your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier temporary hit point.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 6 + your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier temporary hit points.

If the target ally is bloodied, he or she can choose to add the Healing keyword to the attack. If the ally does, on a hit, he or she regains the same number of hit points instead of gaining temporary hit points.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: When an ally in your warlord's aura spends a healing surge, he or she gains a +1 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of his or her next turn.
You can add the Healing keyword to your attacks. If you do, when you hit with an attack, choose one ally in your warlord's aura that has temporary hit points.

power.section: The chosen ally regains a number of hit points equal to the temporary hit points he or she has, then loses those temporary hit points.

power.title: Viper's Poise
power.fluff: Your tactical eye gives an ally a chance to strike despite the care shown by the enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another Warlord at-will attack, you gain the following benefits:

section.name: Opportune Command:
section.text: If the target ally's attack hits, until the end of your next turn, the target enemy provokes a reactive strike from that ally when it shifts.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: Allies in your warlord's aura have a bonus to damage rolls with all triggered attacks, including reactive strikes. The bonus equals your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 3 + your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 6 + your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

power.title: Wolf Pack Poise
power.fluff: Step by step, you and your team surround and overwhelm the enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another Warlord at-will attack, you gain the following benefits:

section.name: Opportune Command:
section.text: The target ally can shift 1 square as the first effect of the attack.
If the target ally flanks the target enemy, his or her attack deals additional damage equal to your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 2 + your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 4 + your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: When you hit an enemy with a melee attack, that enemy counts as flanked when you and one ally, or two allies, are adjacent to it. This lasts until the start of your next turn.
You and your allies in the aura gain combat advantage against enemies that are flanked by your or any of your allies.
